text: (muhminkale!) Marumaiyil ninkal virumpiya patiyo, allatu vetattaiyutaiyavarkal virumpiya patiyo natantu vituvatillai - evan timai ceykirano, avan atarkuriya tantanai valankappatuvan;. Innum avan (anku) allahvait tavira veru yaraiyum (tanakkup) patukavalanakavo, tunai ceypavanakavo kana mattan
